item.description:
Learn the Enneagram beyond the basics - the Subtypes and relationship dynamics. You are so much more than your core types. Learn how the system works as you move between the types and the subcategories within your type.

Herb Pearce is a leading teacher of the Enneagram, having taught over 2000 workshops on it, as well as being the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram, Herb's Tips for Living, and the soon to be The Advanced Book on the Enneagram. He is a therapist who uses the Enneagram in his work with individuals, couples and families, as well as teaching it in organizations for team building and staff development.

9 to 11:30am

$40

781 648 3737

www.herbpearce.com

herb@herbpearce.com

item.name: Advanced Enneagram Workshop
